mapper.sql: "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceShuruiCd" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiCd", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."teikyoKaishiYM" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_teikyoKaishiYM", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."insertDantaiCd" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_insertDantaiCd", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."insertTimestamp" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_insertTimestamp", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."insertReamsLoginId" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_insertReamsLoginId", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."insertContextId" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_insertContextId", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."isDeleted" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_isDeleted", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."updateCount" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_updateCount", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_lastUpdateTimestamp", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."teikyoshuryoYM" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_teikyoshuryoYM", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceShuruiMeisho" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiMeisho", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceShuruiRyakusho" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiRyakusho", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceBunrruicode" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceBunrruicode", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceShuruiNaibuCd" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiNaibuCd", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."gendogakuKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_gendogakuKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."yusenJuni" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_yusenJuni", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."kyotakuServiceKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_kyotakuServiceKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."shiteiServiceKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_shiteiServiceKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."kijunGaitoServiceKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_kijunGaitoServiceKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."minashiKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_minashiKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."gamenHyojiKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_gamenHyojiKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."shien1InKahiKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_shien1InKahiKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."shien2InKahiKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_shien2InKahiKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."nijiyoboInKahiKubun" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_nijiyoboInKahiKubun", "DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui"."serviceShoBunrui" as "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShoBunrui"
mapper.select: SELECT TEMP."serviceShuruiCd", TEMP."serviceShuruiMeisho" FROM ( SELECT DbT7130."serviceShuruiCd", DbT7130. "serviceShuruiMeisho", DbT7130."teikyoKaishiYM", row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY DbT7130."serviceShuruiCd" ORDER BY DbT7130."teikyoKaishiYM" DESC ) AS rrkno FROM rgdb."DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui" AS DbT7130 WHERE DbT7130."teikyoKaishiYM" <= #{systemDate} ) TEMP WHERE TEMP.rrkno = 1

SELECT "serviceShuruiCd" AS "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiCd", "serviceShuruiMeisho" AS "dbT7130KaigoServiceShurui_serviceShuruiMeisho" FROM rgdb."DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui" WHERE "teikyoKaishiYM" <= #{haakuKijunYM} AND #{haakuKijunYM} <= "teikyoshuryoYM"
AND "serviceShuruiCd" IN #{shurui}
AND "serviceBunrruicode" IN #{bunrrui}
AND substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '1'
AND substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '1' OR (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '2' AND "serviceBunrruicode" = '01')
AND (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '1' OR substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '2' OR substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '6' OR substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '7')
AND substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '6' OR (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '2' AND "serviceBunrruicode" = '05') OR (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '7' AND "serviceBunrruicode" = '08')
AND substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '1' OR (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '2' AND "serviceBunrruicode" = '01') OR (substring("serviceShuruiCd", 1, 1) = '7' AND "serviceBunrruicode" = '07')
